notesStmt.note: Translation of: Apology for the honorable nation of the Jews and all the sons of Israel.

Nothing is known about Edward Nicholas, who was once thought to be identical with Sir Edward Nicholas (1593-1669). Some authorities consider the name a pseudonym, disguising, perhaps, Manasseh ben Israel. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
